reviews.review_msg: I'm a serious fan! He gives incredibly good feedback - if you're listening - and he's very focused for every student. I've enjoyed my work with him over the past three years, He makes it worthwhile!

dmac is a great teacher, very insightful and helpful. He can see what's working in a music composition and tell you why. That's been the best thing about his class. He's fair and knowledgeble. He's got a hawk-eye for detail and a great sense of humour.
